tool_description: Get random quotes by Yogi Berra, renowned Major League Baseball catcher and folk sage. (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yogi_Berra)
title: yogia-berra-quotes

api_list.name: /random
api_list.description: Retrieve a random quote by Yogi Berra
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://yogia-berra-quotes.p.rapidapi.com/random"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "yogia-berra-quotes.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

role.name: When you come to a fork in the road, take it.
